bibdata.title: American National Draft Standard Dictionary of Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC) Including Electromagnetic Environmental Effects (E3)
American National Draft Standard Dictionary of Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC) Including Electromagnetic Environmental Effects (E3)
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std C63.14/D3, Aug 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Terms associated with electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) and electromagnetic environmental effects (E3) are defined including electromagnetic pulse (EMP), and electrostatic discharge (ESD) terms. Quantities, units, multiplying factors, symbols, and abbreviations are covered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
